nodes.text: The Drash-So labor camp was a prison established by Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire on Drash-So during the Second Imperial Civil War. Ania Solo was imprisoned there during the war for murdering an individual. Her lover Ramid was also in the camp.

During their imprisonment, Solo was tormented by a prison guard, but ultimately escaped with the help of AG-37. Ramid, however, was shot during the rescue and re-captured. At the end of the war, the camp was liberated by the Empire-in-exile.
